message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. My initial asking price is $1750000. I'm confident that this product is worth every penny and I'm open to discussing a fair price that works for both of us.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure I can meet your initial asking price. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the potential benefits it could bring to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I acknowledge the market value, I believe the potential benefits you'll gain from this product justify a slightly higher price. I'm willing to come down to $1650000. This price reflects the value I know this product will bring to your business, and I'm confident it's a fair compromise.  Let's work together to finalize this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that $1650000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1575000 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair value considering the market and the potential benefits I'll gain from this product.
